UnitDefinition.Name: Dietary exposures details level types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted ietary exposures details level types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Restrict to risk-drivers (dietary exposures screening)
Unit.Description: Restrict to detailed output for risk-drivers identified by dietary exposures screening.

Unit.Name: Omit foods-as-eaten details
Unit.Description: Restrict to detailed output for modelled foods and substances. Omit foods-as-eaten details.
